body:
### Details

For the following build of `openmpi`, I'm seeing a difference in behavior between `spack load` and `module load`. While using `spack load`, this build of `openmpi` is able to compile a test program but when using `module load`, it fails with a link error. Moreover, while it works with `spack load`, the same aforementioned linker error occurs inside a spack environment.

```

iwlfut4     hwloc@2.2.0~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml+pci+shared
5lie7x5         libpciaccess@0.16
pngedkl         libxml2@2.9.10~python
tqv7s2m             libiconv@1.16
upcuvsx             xz@5.2.5~pic
rzzwkeg             zlib@1.2.11+optimize+pic+shared
mnhnykb     libevent@2.1.8+openssl
oifxmgy         openssl@1.1.1i+systemcerts

crrzgox     ucx@1.9.0~assertions~cuda~debug~gdrcopy~java~knem~logging+optimizations~parameter_checking+pic+thread_multiple+xpmem cuda_arch=none
ff4ssqk         rdma-core@32.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo
mtlcksx             libnl@3.3.0
wejool4         xpmem@master+kernel-module

[sajid@xrm-backup test]$
```
#### via `spack load`
```
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ module purge && spack unload --all && spack load /syuu
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ mpicc test.c
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ mpirun -np 2 ./a.out
"Hello World!" from MPI process 0. We are 2 MPI processes.
"Hello World!" from MPI process 1. We are 2 MPI processes.
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$
```

#### via `module load`
```
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ module purge && spack unload
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ module load openmpi-4.1.0-clang-11.0.0-syuuj6l
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ mpicc test.c
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lxpmem
clang-11: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$
```

#### as part of a spack environment
```
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ spack env activate pirt-debug
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$ mpicc test.c
/usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lxpmem
clang-11: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
[sajid@xrm-backup test]$
```

title: Different linking behavior between spack load vs module load
